name: International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Computer Engineering（ICAICE 2020）
content: International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Computer Engineering（ICAICE 2020）will be held on October 23-25 in Beijing, China. ICAICE 2020 is organized by the Automation School of Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications. Conference topics mainly include, but not limited to Frontier technologies of artificial intelligence, biometrics, AI for medical science, natural language processing, intelligent computing systems, AI for industry, etc. Meeting Time: Oct. 23-25, 2020 Full paper Submission Due: August 23, 2020 Abstract Submission Due: August 23, 2020 Decision Notification: 5-7 working days after submission Attendees Registration Due: Oct. 16, 2020 All accepted conference papers will be published by IEEE CS CPS(Conference Publishing Services), and then submit to IEEE Xplore, Ei Compendex, Scoups and CPCI for retrieval. CONTACT US Conference Secretary: Vivian Wang E-mail: icaice2020@163.com Tel: +86-19139737380 (Wechat) QQ: 2644824662
organizers: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
